titleStmt.title: Instructions directed from the Kings Most Excellent Maiestie vnto all the Bishops of this Kingdome and fit to be put in execution, agreeable to the necessitie of the time.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
